configure.p: The NexusFileReader actor reads a Nexus file from the local file system and outputs the file content as a string.

property.name: port:inputTrigger
property.configure: An input port that can receive tokens of any type. The actor will not fire until the port receives an input token. Often, the trigger port receives input from an Initializer actor, which connects to the CIPRES registry.

property.name: port:outputFileContent
property.configure: An output port that broadcasts the Nexus file content.

property.name: prop:fileNamePar
property.configure: The name of the Nexus file to open and read. Click Browse to select a file from the local system.
